name: Johi Farm
description:
Keyboard Control:

  • Left/Right Arrows: Movements
  • Up Arrow: Jump
  • X Button: Interact/Attack
  • Click flower icon @ top right: Toggle Sound

Big Joe is a tiny farmer owning a tiny farm in the middle of the forest.

Help him grow his crop: get rids of the worms while keeping the bud well-hydrated.

This is an entry for Ludum Dare #38: A Small World. Have fun and please leave comments :)
